title: Digital Education for Traditional Crafts: Multi-Web Courseware for Songket Weaving Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic weaving techniques and experience using craft tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented educational environment for in-service professionals, integrating personal device utilization and blended (online-offline) learning.

learning_goals: One can digitally simulate at least five basic patterns of Songket weaving
Learners can independently perform over 70% of the weaving process using interactive tools in web courseware
Through online discussion modules, learners can collaboratively propose at least three weaving problem-solving solutions with peers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
